sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.DiscoverChoiceList</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Functions for choosing 'discover' value on Discovery Schedules/Status</description>
        <name>DiscoverChoiceList</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var DiscoverChoiceList = Class.create();
DiscoverChoiceList.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getDefaultValue : function(table) {
		var discoGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice'); 
		discoGr.addQuery('name', table);
		discoGr.addQuery('element', 'discover');
		discoGr.orderBy('sequence');
		discoGr.setLimit(1);
		discoGr.query();
		if (discoGr.next())
			return discoGr.getValue('value');
	},

	type: 'DiscoverChoiceList'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>christopher.thompson</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-09-23 16:53:36</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5104c3c677421110a760d14b8d5a994d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>DiscoverChoiceList</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Core Automation" source="com.snc.core.automation">6ca7f42c3cb1311068bcf327dfe37f6a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5104c3c677421110a760d14b8d5a994d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>christopher.thompson</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-09-23 16:53:36</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
